title: Three unkown fonts - sans "Paul" w/ cut off corners, antique serif "Journal", geometric sans "32"
content:
Hi, I’d be happy if anyone could id one or more of these... Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213851im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/paul_6550.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213851im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/KB2765_C09_07_U_5360.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213851im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/32_3490.gif)

author: april

comments.content:
Journal resembles Engravers Roman but it isn’t quite a match

32 looks hand-drawn

Paul might be too.
“PAUL” looks a bit like [BocaRatonSolid](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213851/http:/www.identifont.com/show?7RV), but it’s definitely been modified.

You could probably make Paul out of this:

[http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=419157](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603213851/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=419157 "http://www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=419157")
